mapper.select: select id, sn, e_name, eid, store_id, store_name, franchisee_id, franchisee_name, month_start_power, month_end_power, month_sum_power, month_sum_charge, json_charge, date, tenant_id, create_time from t_ele_power_month_record where id = #{id}

select id, sn, e_name, eid, store_id, store_name, franchisee_id, franchisee_name, month_start_power, month_end_power, month_sum_power, month_sum_charge, json_charge, date, tenant_id, create_time from t_ele_power_month_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_power_month_record(sn, e_name, eid, store_id, store_name, franchisee_id, franchisee_name, month_start_power, month_end_power, month_sum_power, month_sum_charge, json_charge, date, tenant_id, create_time) values (#{sn}, #{eName}, #{eid}, #{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{franchiseeId}, #{franchiseeName}, #{monthStartPower}, #{monthEndPower}, #{monthSumPower}, #{monthSumCharge}, #{jsonCharge}, #{date}, #{tenantId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update t_ele_power_month_record
sn = #{sn},
e_name = #{eName},
eid = #{eid},
store_id = #{storeId},
store_name = #{storeName},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
franchisee_name = #{franchiseeName},
month_start_power = #{monthStartPower},
month_end_power = #{monthEndPower},
month_sum_power = #{monthSumPower},
month_sum_charge = #{monthSumCharge},
json_charge = #{jsonCharge},
date = #{date},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
